title: Bittrex US Allows Fiat and Crypto Withdrawals Amid Bankruptcy Proceedings
description: Bittrex US, the now-defunct cryptocurrency exchange in the United States, has recently introduced a plan that permits American customers to withdraw crypto and fiat from the platform, provided they satisfy the required regulatory criteria. This withdrawal arrangement was approved on Tuesday by the U.S. bankruptcy court located in Delaware. Cryptocurrency Exchange Bittrex US Enables Customer […]

title: ZachXBT’s “exposes” leads to lawsuit for defamation and conspiracy
description: On June 16, it was reported on social media that ZachXBT, a blockchain investigator, is facing a lawsuit for libel from Jeffrey Huang, also known as “MachiBigBrother” on Twitter. Huang accuses ZachXBT of tarnishing his reputation through false allegations. In response, ZachXBT dismissed the lawsuit as baseless and an attempt to suppress free speech, vowing ... Read more

title: Brink receives $5 million donation from Jack Dorsey’s Start Small initiative to support Bitcoin developers
description: In another move to fuel the growth of the Bitcoin ecosystem, tech mogul Jack Dorsey has pledged a $5 million donation to Brink, a nonprofit organization supporting open-source developers in the Bitcoin space. The donation will be spread over five years, with $1 million being contributed annually. This contribution is part of Dorsey’s philanthropic initiative, ... Read more
